titleStmt.title: A booke of presidents, with additions of diuers necessarie instruments, meete for all such as desire to learne the manner and forme how to make euidences and instruments, &c. as in the table of this booke more plainly appeareth..
Book of precedents.
titleStmt.author: Phayer, Thomas, 1510?-1560.

publicationStmt.publisher: [By A. Islip] for the Company of Stationers.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: British Library.
